entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.8°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
